stories.headline: Gambian Jammeh-era victims seek ‘real justice’ beyond reparations
stories.description: Those who suffered abuses under Jammeh say the ex-leader now comfortably in exile must be held accountable for crimes.

stories.headline: UK government finances better than expected in January
stories.description: The government took in more from tax receipts than expected, official data suggests.

stories.headline: Bolivia’s ex-leader Morales reappears in stronghold after 7-week absence
stories.description: The public appearance ends rumours that Morales fled the country following the abduction of Nicolas Maduro in Venezuela.

stories.headline: One killed, 11 injured in Yemen after security forces disperse STC storming
stories.description: Protest erupts after the internationally recognised gov’t holds its first session in the southern city of Aden.

stories.headline: Venezuela grants amnesty that could release hundreds of political detainees
stories.description: More than 600 people may be in custody for political reasons, one Venezuelan rights group estimates.
